name: THE COUNCIL FOR RESPONSIBLE NUTRITION
sampleDescriptions: Provide strategic counsel and lobbying efforts for the Council for Responsible Nutrition to fully implement and enforce DSHEA, increase congressional funding for FDA, and tax issues such as security H
